scripts.dev: firebase use staging && yarn build:watch & env-cmd -f .env.development firebase emulators:start --only firestore,storage,functions,pubsub --import=../emulator/seeds --export-on-exit=../emulator/seeds
scripts.test: firebase use test && firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,storage,functions,pubsub --import=../emulator/seeds --export-on-exit=../emulator/seeds --ui 'env-cmd -f .env.development jest --watch'
scripts.test:e2e: firebase use test && firebase emulators:exec --only firestore,storage --import=../emulator/e2e --ui 'env-cmd -f .env.development jest --watch'
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
